Description: VNice Black Agile LP Model 2000. Serial # A02728, made in Korea. Agile guitars has quickly gained in popularity, offering wonderful bang for the buck and very nice quality workmanship. Ours is in Extra nice condition with only a few very light wear. It is clean. The neck is sweet with low action. All electronics work perfectly with no static and it sounds good :-). Strings still in good condition. Worst flaw is prior owner took off pick guard and lost it. No case but will pack with extra care. . As with all our fine instruments, we understand the bond between player and instrument and offer a 30 day play/return policy with No restocking fee. ( see below ). *****PLEASE READ***** PLEASE ask any questions before Purchasing. ***** US SHIPPING***** Buyers pay shown shipping quote. We pay to fully insure your purchase against loss or damage in shipping :-) We ship by Fed Ex within the US. *****WE ACCEPT***** Paypal and Whatever payments Ebay allows this month :-) *****INTERNATIONAL***** If the calculator can not give a cost, it is probably too large to ship to you. PLEASE ask before purchasing. Import duties. taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges; These charges are the buyers responsibility. Please check your country’s customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding; These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight ( shipping ) company or when you pick the item up. Do not confuse them for additional shipping charges; We do not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as “gifts”. US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior. We will report anyone requesting such to Ebay security. ***. We will insure your item to the extent your country allows. We are often unable to purchase full insurance for many countries. It is the buyers responsibility to know if their country allows for full coverage. Please contact us at once in the rare case of a damaged package. ALSO, PLEASE understand that we control neither the US postal service nor your local postal and customs services; Most often packages arrive in quick time, but we have seen enough international packages take weeks to know there can be problems. We will of course help in the rare case of damage or loss, but can do little more than sympathize for slow deliveries; We always offer our International buyers our 100% satisfaction refund policy, but we can no longer make ANY partial refunds to International buyers; All International shipments are by USPS Airmail ( Priority or Express ) only. ***** We sell items anywhere from Mint new in box to As is for parts or repair only conditions. All items are guaranteed to be in working condition unless otherwise noted; Please be careful to only bid on items in the condition you are wanting. !!!!.... MOST IMPORTANT ......!!!!; If you receive ANY item you are unhappy with, we will give you a prompt and courteous refund ( return postage responsibility of purchaser ) as long as we are contacted within 14 days (unless otherwise noted AS IS ITEM)....Bid with confidence, only a few folks have shot at us over the years. Title: VNice Black Agile Set Neck LP Model 2000
